nodes.body: The Marpa Kagyü order takes its name from Marpa Druptop Sherap Senggé (smar pa grub thob shes rab seng ge, aka shes rab ye shes, 12th century), who founded the sect at Sho Monastery (sho dgon) in Kham (khams).
nodes.title: An Overview of the Marpa Kagyü Tradition

meta.title: An Overview of the Marpa Kagyü Tradition
